chapter.title: Changes to &PRODUCT; for Specific Audiences
chapter.para: Some new features, enhancements, and bug fixes don't always apply to all users of an &PRODUCT; system, but rather are intended for specific audiences, such as users of a particular managed device type.

section.title: Changes since &LASTPRODVER;
section.para: The following specific-audience changes have have gone into effect since &PRODUCT; &LASTPRODVER;

listitem.para: The Cisco Firewall Service Module is now detected as a firewall.Bug: 4088.

varlistentry.term: Feature: Data Collection for Cisco C1250 Wireless Access Point

listitem.para: The Cisco C1250 Wireless Access Point is detected as such and proper statistics will be collected for it by default. Bug: 4071.
Makelsan UPS' are detected and proper statistics are now collected by default. Bug: 4090.
System statistics for Force10 10Gb ethernet switches are now collected and graphed. Bug: 4088.
On-Battery and Power Restored events received from APC UPS' will set and clear alarms for those conditions. Bug: 4054.
